name: Fairyland: Fairy Power
description: This is a board game about fairies. You have to collect as much magical energy as possible from the Flowers and prevent other competitors from doing it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)

reviews.review_text: Fairyland: Fairy Power game really good. You need to gather as much magical energy as possible from the flower - the source and prevent other competitors to do it. The game is very detailed and it took some help to get me through the game, Read the story! The game is fun if you are the type of person who loves challenges, smarts and investigations, i'd highly recommend this to you if you're that kind of person.   - Nice soundtrack - Mystery - Logical   9/10 for me
